entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
